subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Michael Grabner, who led the Islanders with 34 goals after being claimed off waivers, is staying with the team after agreeing to a five-year deal that keeps him away from free agency.
snippet: Michael Grabner, who led the Islanders with 34 goals after being claimed off waivers, is staying with the team after agreeing to a five-year deal that keeps him away from free agency.
